aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Bernard Ofoegbu
aboutData.subtitle: Fullstack Developer
aboutData.text: I am a Full-Stack Developer with a keen emphasis on crafting seamless digital experiences. My expertise spans both front-end and back-end development, aiming to not only deliver functional solutions but also to engage, empower, and optimize user interactions. Through my work, I strive to stimulate engagement, streamline processes, and drive impactful results by seamlessly integrating technology to meet diverse needs

services.title: Backend Development

services.title: Mobile Development

services.title: API development and Integration

services.title: Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)
services.text: Implementing automated pipelines to streamline the process of building, testing, and deploying software updates.
